Game: Ninja Reflex 2008-03-04T00:00:00-08:00 Ninja Reflex is a video game developed by Sanzaru Games, and co-published by Nunchuck Games and Electronic Arts. It was released for Wii and Nintendo DS on March 4, 2008 in North America and March 14, 2008 in Europe.
